description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of function f(x) = 8x + 7.
comments: n, 8*n+7, 64*n+63, 512*n+511 and 4096*n+4095 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..5000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(8*n+7) and IsPrime(64*n+63) and IsPrime(512*n+511) and IsPrime(4096*n+4095)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
